comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: F-80C serial 49-806 of the 49th Fighter Bomber Group; this aircraft later served with the 35th and 80th Fighter Bomber Squadrons of the 8th FBG.

comment.author: 92816977@N02
comment._content: Great photo, does anyone know where this was taken? Is it Wonsan Airfield? I ask because I have similar photo's in my possession.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/92816977@N02] Nothing on the original photo indicates the location...
